node.title: Festivals, dancing, live music, clubbing all back in regional Victoria
node.alt: People raise their fists in a nightclub.
node.description: The easing of Victoria's COVID restrictions have come not a moment too soon for regional clubs and music festivals.
node.content:
["The easing of Victoria's COVID restrictions have come not a moment too soon for regional clubs and music festivals.", "Victorians are enjoying eased restrictions today, which the Premier describes as \"a return to normal\".", "In the western Victorian town of Horsham, Wilson's \u2014\u00a0the town's only nightclub and the only one in any direction for 200 kilometres \u2014\u00a0can reopen tonight after 131 days.", "Manager Chris Harrison said despite this challenge, he had\u00a0been lucky.", "\"Compared to other venues we've retained most of our staff,\" Mr Harrison said.", "\"We've lost one or two [people moving to different jobs]\u00a0due to the lag time of being able to reopen, and then we've picked up a few more as well.", "\"All our staff are vaccinated.\"", "Mr Harrison said re-opening would mean as much to Horsham's social fabric as it did to his bottom line.", "\"Coming out and seeing familiar faces all the time, instead of having to go out with a select group of friends [makes a difference].\"", "Masks would not be required indoors while dancing at nightclubs, but staff still needed them.", "
Port Fairy Adventure Film Festival
", "Meanwhile,\u00a0the organisers behind next week's Port Fairy Adventure Film Festival said\u00a0they were relieved and excited to be able to offer full capacity, just in the nick of time.\u00a0", "Starting from next Monday and running until Sunday, November 28th, the festival featured\u00a0international films showcasing adventure documentaries from around the world.", "The festival was cancelled last year due to the COVID-19 pandemic.", "Tickets sold out within two days to the beloved local event, which draws in viewers from across the state.\u00a0", "", "
The Port Fairy Adventure Film Festival will be able to open at full capacity next week.(Supplied: Port Fairy Adventure Film Festival Facebook)
", "Festival program Director Leon Moreton said he was quietly confident density limits would be changed but anticipated the change would come mid next week.", "\"But I think everyone was doing their part in getting the double-dose vaccination ... the community have done a great job ... and so now we get to reap the rewards.\"", "The festival would run with some restrictions still in place.", "\"We'll abide by all the State Government requirements,\" he said.", "\"We'll have the QR check-in systems and people will need to be fully vaccinated to attend our events.\"", "
No help for Mildura's paddle steamers
", "The eased restrictions would not be much comfort to the operator of Mildura's Paddle Steamers,\u00a0which said it was caught in the middle of two states' COVID restrictions.", "", "
Only one of the three paddleboat\u00a0steamers are operating, and only at 50 per cent capacity, due to NSW restrictions.(ABC News: Leonie Thorne)
", "The business was registered in New South Wales, so it must operate at one person per two square metres under that state's current COVID restrictions.", "But most of its passengers were from Victoria.", "Mildura Paddle Steamers marketing manager Ashton McKenzie said\u00a0only one of the three boats was running, and at 50 per cent capacity.", "\"So the paddle steamer Melbourne hasn't run since the first lockdown which was nearly two years ago.", "\"Once the restrictions ease in both states we will see a lot more people travelling.\""]
